text: Blue-gray is a bluish-gray color. It is also known as livid. The name "livid" comes from a Latin word lividus. Lividus means 'a dull leaden-blue color'.Maerz and Paul A Dictionary of Color New York:1930 McGraw-Hill Discussion of the color Livid Page 165 == References == Category:Shades of blue Category:Shades of gray
title: Blue-gray
